title: Welcome To Panamá
description: Panama, a fascinating Central American country, strikes the perfect balance between natural wonders, a vibrant culture, and economic vitality. Famous for the iconic Panama Canal, which connects the Caribbean Sea and the Pacific Ocean, Panama is a hub of global trade. Its stunning landscapes range from lush rainforests to pristine beaches, making it an ideal spot for eco-tourism and adventure seekers. With a diverse population blending indigenous, Afro-Caribbean, and Spanish influences, Panama boasts a unique fusion of traditions, music, and food. Its robust economy and stable democracy make it a place where the modern and the traditional coexist harmoniously, making Panama an exciting destination for travelers and investors alike.

services.title: Accommodations
services.intro: Panama offers a diverse range of accommodations to suit every traveler's preferences and budget. From luxurious hotels with stunning views of the Panama Canal and the Pacific Ocean to budget-friendly hostels in the heart of vibrant cities, and cozy Airbnb rentals that provide a home away from home, Panama caters to a variety of tastes.

services.title: Airport Transportation
services.intro: There are three different ways to get from Panama airport to Panama City; taxi, bus or metro. Taking a taxi from Panama City airport to downtown is the quickest way to travel, with a journey time of just 25 minutes and a set cost of $30 (€28). Taking the metro is the cheapest option, as it costs just $0.60 (€0.50) per traveller, but it is also the slowest transfer option as it is not direct, with a journey time of 1 hour. Your final option is the bus, which takes 50 minutes to get from Panama airport to the city and costs $1.25 (€1.20) one-way. Credit: welcomepickups.com.

services.title: Stay Informed About Local Laws
services.intro: Familiarize yourself with Panama's local laws and regulations, including those related to drugs, alcohol, and customs..
list: Don't use or carry illegal drugs
Vaping is banned in public spaces and on public transport

services.title: Wildlife Safety
services.intro: f you're exploring Panama's lush natural landscapes, be cautious around wildlife, as some species may be venomous or carry diseases. Keep a safe distance and do not feed wild animals.

packages.title: Panama Canal Full Transit Boat Tour
packages.text: This narrated tour of the Panama Canal travels the full width of the Isthmus of Panama, starting from the Pacific Ocean. Set out from your hotel in Panama City and end in Colón, on the coast of the Caribbean Sea. En route you’ll pass through Miraflores Locks and stop by the visitor center. Credit:TripAdvisor

packages.title: San Blas
packages.text: The palm-fringed beaches and traditional villages of the San Blas Islands lie just east of Colon along Panama’s Caribbean coast. On this tour, visit multiple islands in one day such as Aguja, Pelicano, and Perro islands; enjoy fun activities such as swimming, snorkeling, and kayaking; visit a sunken shipwreck; and take a swim in a natural pool. Credit: Tripadvisor

packages.title: Biomuseo
packages.text: Designed by world-renowned architect Frank Gehry, the Biomuseo is his only work in Latin America and the tropics. The building was designed to tell the story of how the isthmus of Panama rose from the sea, uniting two continents, separating a vast ocean in two, and changing the planet's biodiversity forever. Credit: Tripadvisor

packages.title: Casco Antiguo
packages.text: This charming old community’s churches, pedestrian walkways and historical plazas and palaces make it a must-see on any tour.

packages.title: Volcan Baru Hike
packages.text: Looking for an experience in Panama like no other? What about catching the sunrise at the top of a (dormant) volcano? Yes! The Volcan Baru sunrise hike is the Boquete tour you are looking for. Yes, it is physically demanding... prepare to do some work... but your sweet reward is about the sweetest you can imagine! Did we mention viral photo ops? The summit of Volcan Baru offers panoramic views all the way into Costa Rica! Credit:the panama tourist site

packages.title: Bocas del Toro Snorkeling Tour
packages.text: Panama's Bocas del Toro archipelago of islands covers a large area. This speedboat tour from Bocas Town includes the most popular spots in one day. See the dolphins of Dolphin Bay, snorkel around the Zapatilla Islands and explore their white sand beaches, look for sloths on Sloth Island, and enjoy a fresh Caribbean seafood lunch (not included). Credit: Tripadvisor
